description.p: DISTRHO-Ports LV2, VST and VST3 plugins includes:

ul.li: Artican: The Function and The Pilgrim
CHOW: A maximally truculent distortion effect.
Dexed: Synth that is closely modeled on the Yamaha DX7.
dRowAudio: Distortion, Distortion Shaper, Flanger, Reverb, Tremolo.
EasySSP: Easy Sound Space Perception audio visualization tool.
HiReSam: Spectrum Analyzer.
JuceOPL: Classic game sounds synthesizer.
Juced: DrumSynth and EQinox.
KlangFalter: A convolution audio plugin.
LUFS Meter: Measures loudness similar to the human perception of loudness.
Luftikus: Analog EQ with fixed half-octave bands and additional high frequency boost.
Obxd: Emulation of famous ob-x, ob-xa and ob8 synths.
PitchedDelay: Delay that allow pitching the delayed signal.
ReFine: Add a final polishing to your tracks, busses and masters.
Stereo Source Separator: Uses the spatial information hidden in the stereo signal for source separation.
TAL Plugins: Dub-3, Filter, Filter-2, NoiseMaker, Reverb, Reverb-2, Reverb-3 and Vocoder-2.
Temper: modern digital distortion.
Vex: A 3 oscillator subtractive waverom synth.
Wolpertinger: Subtractive, antialiased polyphonic software synthesizer.
